  • CAD switch: Presetting masks
  • View page source

CAD switch: Presetting masksÂ¶

Preset new list CAD2CDB

Presetting mask attributes with metadata can be configured for each CAD system and user by using this CAD switch. The mappings configured in these CAD switches overwrite those from the File properties in the system client mentioned at another point.

The value of this switch contains the presettings. The individual presettings are separated by a semicolon. A presetting is configured according to the following syntax:

System attribute name =$(Variable)

or:

System attribute name =Fester Wert

Example:

titel=My Prefix: $(Title);z_bemerkung=$(Subject)

Note

Refer to Commit Microsoft Windows file attributes in the CONTACT Elements manual Administration and Configuration for a complete list of possible variables.
